summary.para: The CMSG_RECIPIENT_ENCRYPTED_KEY_INFO structure contains information used for an individual key agreement recipient.
structure identifying the recipient. Currently, only the ISSUER_SERIAL_NUMBER or KEYID choices in the CERT_ID structure are valid.
A CRYPT_DATA_BLOB structure that contains the encrypted content encryption key.
Optional. When present, this member specifies which of the recipient's previously distributed UKMs was used by the sender. Only applicable to KEYID choice in the RecipientId structure.
Optional pointer to a structure containing additional information. Only applicable to KEYID choice in the RecipientId structure.
